camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Steep Aerial Drone Shot, 60Â° Bird's eye view, Almost Isometric perspective
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 50mm Standard lens equivalent, Low perspective distortion (Orthographic feel), High clarity, Edge-to-edge sharpness
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Everything in sharp focus from rooftops to street level

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Late Afternoon (approx 4:00 PM), Low solar angle
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Strong Directional Sunlight (Raking Light) on the main buildings, Hard Light source creating distinct shadow lines, High Contrast (Chiaroscuro)
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Crystal Clear Sky, High visibility, No atmospheric haze, Crisp air
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Long, deep, distinct cast shadows; Cool blue-toned shadows contrasting with warm sunlit facades

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Daylight dominant, No visible artificial interior lighting, Reflective glass mirroring the sky and surrounding buildings
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Natural sunlight highlighting the texture of the facade, 'Self-shadowing' of architectural elements

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural daylight illuminating the paving patterns, High contrast between sunlit facade and shadowed asphalt
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Top-down sunlight on roofs, creating a vibrant pop against the bright architecture

color_and_grading.palette_theme: High Contrast Modernism, Stark White/Grey Architecture vs Deep Black Shadows vs Vibrant Roofs
color_and_grading.temperature: Dual Tone: Warm Golden Sunlight (4500K) on illuminated faces vs Cool Blue Skylight (7500K) in shadows
color_and_grading.post_processing: High Clarity, Structure enhancement, Neutral White Balance (slight warm bias in highlights), Low Saturation in shadows

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: V-Ray 6 (Sun & Sky system), Corona Renderer, Octane Render (Daylight)
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Architectural Survey, Aerial Real Estate Photography
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Sharp geometric edges, Detailed rooftop mechanical equipment textures (HVAC units)

environment_textures.ground_surface: Dark asphalt roads with crisp white traffic markings, Light grey geometric paving in courtyards
environment_textures.foliage_style: Rectangular patches of courtyard lawn, Urban street trees
